title: Night Planes: When One and Done Becomes Fly Till You Die
description: August, 1985. While treasure hunters search for Spanish gold in the Florida Keys, the real treasure, white gold is smuggled into the United States from Colombia. Most of it passes through Williams Cay, a private island in the Bahamas that is a hedonistic, modern day Sodom and Gomorrah. Mike Barnes, a young army veteran, recruited as a hired gun was talked into a one-off job, but he's learning: once Williams Cay has you, you don't leave. Will Mike escape to freedom or will he continue to make deadly runs to the lawless Colombian jungle? Night Planes is an action adventure novel that won't disappoint!
author: Patrick Link
